summary: Website for a photography service with a clean minimal visual style, limited to visible pages: Home, About Us, and Get in Touch (Contact). Includes a Booking/Inquiry form with local-only submission storage + success message, displays contact details (email + phone), and now requires a separate non-client-visible office/admin URL/page to view received inquiries (client-facing URL remains public).
architectural_notes: Visual direction updated to a clean, minimal style (supersedes prior warm editorial styling guidance).
Deployment/site domain slug should be a short hyphenated name; user-provided slug: "vows-site".
Branding update: Home page studio name should be "The Stories By Vows" (replacing "Lumiere Studio").
Branding update expanded: replace "Lumiere Studio" with "The Stories By Vows" everywhere on the site (all pages/sections), not only homepage chrome.
Scope change: remove Pricing, Package Details, and Our Work/Portfolio pages; only Home, About Us, and Get in Touch should be visible.
Footer update: remove Quick Links and Contact Details; add Instagram link under Follow Us (https://www.instagram.com/thestoriesbehindvows?igsh=bWdrN3o1M21meDBn).
Scope update: Re-add a Booking/Inquiry form (location TBD: Home and/or Get in Touch) with local-only storage and a success message on submit; no email sending/back-end.
Footer/content update: Display contact details (email: thestoriesbehindvows@gmail.com, phone: 7780748708) somewhere on the site (placement TBD; previously contact details were removed from footer).
Requirement: provide two URLs/entry points — a public client-facing site for sending inquiries, and a separate private office/admin area/page for viewing received inquiries (not visible to clients).
Note: current inquiry storage is local-only (per browser). A true office/admin URL for receiving/viewing inquiries across devices may require shared persistence/auth beyond local browser storage.
known_issues: Build/deploy can fail if the autogenerated domain name is too long or contains invalid characters; must be 5–50 chars and only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for a photography service with a top navigation and sections/pages for: Home (hero + overview), About Us, Our Work (portfolio gallery), Pricing, and Package Details.
Implement the About Us section/page with: a short studio/service story, photographer highlights (e.g., 2–4 cards), and a list of service specialties (e.g., weddings, portraits, events, product).
Implement the Our Work (Portfolio) section/page as a gallery with category filters (e.g., Weddings, Portraits, Events, Product) and a lightbox/modal preview when an image is clicked.
Implement the Pricing section/page with a clear pricing table/cards for at least 3 tiers (e.g., Basic, Standard, Premium), including price, short description, and key inclusions.

Implement the Package Details section/page that expands each package into a detailed view including: duration/coverage, deliverables (e.g., edited photos count), turnaround time, add-ons, and booking terms.

Add a Contact/Inquiry call-to-action area (on Home and/or Contact section) with a simple form (name, email, event type, date, message). Submission should show a success message and store the inquiry locally in browser state only (no backend persistence) unless a backend is explicitly requested later.

Establish a coherent visual theme and design system for the site (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards) and apply it consistently across all pages/sections. Use a warm, editorial style (e.g., cream/charcoal accents, elegant serif headings paired with clean sans-serif body) and avoid blue/purple-dominant palettes.
Add generated static image assets to support the design (hero image and portfolio placeholders) and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated without routing images through the backend.

Update the photography website’s visual theme to a clean, minimal style and apply it consistently across all sections (NavBar, Home/Hero, About, Portfolio + filters + lightbox, Pricing, Package Details/accordion, Contact form, Footer). This includes simplifying the color palette, typography, spacing, borders/shadows, and interactive states to feel minimal and uncluttered while preserving existing content and functionality.

Configure the project build/deploy to use the user-provided domain-style name "vows-site" (5–50 characters, only letters/numbers/hyphens) instead of any autogenerated or overly long domain value, and ensure the build proceeds successfully.

Replace the displayed studio/brand name text "Lumière Studio" with "The Stories By Vows" anywhere it appears in the Home page chrome (navigation brand link and footer brand label), ensuring the new name renders consistently on desktop and mobile.

Replace all user-facing occurrences of the studio name "Lumière Studio" / "Lumiere Studio" across the entire site with "The Stories By Vows" (including headings and body copy such as the About section).

Replace the current hero and portfolio/gallery images with a new set of static images, and ensure the site loads the new images from frontend/public/assets/generated without routing through the backend.
Update the Pricing content (tiers, prices, descriptions, and inclusions) displayed on the Pricing section to the user’s revised pricing.
Update the About Us section copy to change the founding year from 2014 to 2021 (i.e., replace the text "Founded in 2014" with "Founded in 2021" in the About Us paragraph).
Remove the Our Work (Portfolio), Pricing, and Package Details/Packages sections from the site so that only the Home, About Us, and Get in Touch sections are visible.
Update the top navigation to remove links to Our Work, Pricing, and Packages, leaving only Home and About Us, plus the existing Get in Touch call-to-action.
Update the Home hero section buttons so there is no call-to-action that scrolls to the removed Our Work/Portfolio section.

Update the footer to remove the Quick Links and Contact sections entirely, and keep only a Follow Us area that contains a single Instagram link to https://www.instagram.com/thestoriesbehindvows?igsh=bWdrN3o1M21meDBn.

Ensure the site includes a visible Booking/Inquiry form (within the existing Get in Touch section) that allows users to submit: name, email, event type, preferred date, and message; on successful submit, show a clear success state/message and store the submission locally in the browser (no backend persistence and no email sending).

Add visible contact details on the site that display the email address "thestoriesbehindvows@gmail.com" and mobile number "7780748708" as user-facing text, with appropriate clickable links (mailto: and tel:).
Persist Booking/Inquiry form submissions in the Motoko backend so that inquiries can be received and viewed from an office/admin page (not just stored in the client browser).

Create a separate office/admin page available at a second URL path (e.g., #/office) that lists all received inquiries in one place, and do not add any navigation/link to this page in the client-facing UI.
Restrict the office/admin inquiries page so that it is not accessible to clients: require Internet Identity login and enforce backend authorization for listing inquiries.
Provide (in the UI copy on the office/admin page) the two URLs users need: one for clients (public site) and one for the office/admin inquiries page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a photography service website including Pricing, About Us, Our Work/Portfolio, and Package Details sections/pages.
Replace all occurrences of the studio name "Lumiere Studio" across the entire site with "The Stories By Vows".
Update About Us content to change the founding year from 2014 to 2021.
Update site navigation/visible pages to remove Pricing, Package Details, and Our Work; keep only Home, About Us, and Get in Touch pages.
Update footer: remove Quick Links and Contact Details; keep/add a Follow Us area with an Instagram link to https://www.instagram.com/thestoriesbehindvows?igsh=bWdrN3o1M21meDBn.
Re-add a Booking/Inquiry form to the site that shows a success message on submit and stores submissions locally in browser state only (no email/backend).
Add visible contact details on the site: email thestoriesbehindvows@gmail.com and phone 7780748708.
Add a private (not client-visible) office/admin page/URL to view received Booking/Inquiry submissions, separate from the public client website URL.

projectName: Photography Service Website (About, Portfolio, Pricing, Packages)
